round_best: Develop a hybrid preconditioning method that integrates machine learning with traditional algebraic techniques to adaptively optimize preconditioner configurations based on the characteristics of specific matrices and their performance in prior iterations. The approach could use reinforcement learning where the agent learns the best preconditioning strategy by observing the convergence behavior of iterative methods under various preconditioner settings. This would allow the system to dynamically adjust its strategies, thus improving both the speed and accuracy of solving ill-conditioned, sparse linear systems.
